long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Parkour Race for Chrome Extension is an exciting online game that can be played for free on the website https://classroom-6x.org/.
Parkour Race is an engaging 3D running game that challenges players to navigate through an urban environment by running, jumping, and performing acrobatic stunts. Developed by Madbox, the game allows you to take control of a stickman character and compete against other runners in a thrilling race over rooftops and through the city streets.

The game features daily challenges, power-ups, and customization options that let you personalize your stickman's appearance with a variety of glamorous accessories. By running over speed boosters and executing vaults and flips, you can gain momentum and showcase your parkour skills.

Parkour Race offers an exhilarating running experience that takes the genre to the next level. Players can access the game for free on the Classroom 6x website, where a variety of other unblocked games are available.

*Note:We have added "Classroom 6x, Poki unblocked" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://classroom-6x.org/, https://poki.ee/
